name: Detective Limp
description:
“Detective Limp: How I learnt to embrace the hangover and lose control” is a PS1 style physics-based ragdoll collectathon set in a failing detective’s apartment.

This is Detective Limp. He’s completely hungover and out of control. It’s your job to help him find his clothes so he can leave for work.

Made by Jimthelad and Emigotoyota for the GMTK 2020 Game Jam.  

Sadly the game never went live for the jam for unknown reasons. 

CONTROLS

WASD – wiggle

LEFT/RIGHT CLICK – grab with corresponding arm to pull yourself along

ESC – menu
